description: An exposure of sensitive information to an unauthorized actor vulnerability [CWE-200] in FortiClient for Linux version 7.0.2 and below, 6.4.7 and below and 6.2.9 and below may allow an unauthenticated attacker to access the confighandler webserver via external binaries.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: FortiClientLinux 7.0.2 and below,  6.4.7 and below, 6.2.9 and below
